result.arabic_text: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
result.translation: 148. Tokkel woo maray yisbireh Yalli Addunyâ galto (iisaa kee xannaba kinnuk) kee Akeerâ meqe galto (jannat kinnuk) keenih yeceeh, Yalli meqe maray taama yeymeeqeeh Niya kaah caglise kicnih.
